review_text: got this for my mother because she has a hard time sleeping and obviously is very stressed and grumpy in the mornings because she didn’t get enough sleep so I got it for her and now she sleeps like wonderfully and has no stress and I just can’t believe it’s like a whole new mother!!!!!!!!

Nice quality and special blend I have never had before! It’s tea season! I love this tea and I brew it daily or nightly for myself and my husband. The blend is very nice and the benefits of herbs are priceless. It’s pretty good price for the amount of tea bags you get too. No caffeine in this tea, just how we like it.

I absolutely love Yogi teas! They're all fantastic, so just find the one with the perfect ingredients or purpose for you. This one is perfect for a bedtime tea routine. The taste is super pleasant with no synthetic flavours or fragrances. If you're like me and love a big mug of tea, I'd suggest using two tea bags because one might be too weak. Enjoy!
gosh I am so so obsessed with yogi teas and always happy when new flavors come out for me to try!! especially the stress support ones - so this one is a new game changer in my cubord :)

This is a supplement that everyone needs to take. Helps with blood sugar regulation and inflammation. which made my skin clear and glowy..The quality is great.. it curves my appetite and give energy as coffee ..And my thoughts about food are gone and I love it!

It's nice, although I was expecting it to be more flavorful and creamy, like the traditional horchata that I have had. But I added a lot of coconut milk and cream and it made a tasty hot drink in the evening. I would probably buy it again.
I was so excited to try this tea and it did not disappoint. It’s a great addition to the Yogi line-up, and bonus points for a no-licorice formulation.
I'm surprised how good it is. the tea tastes great and it did help me sleep and quality is top notch for this brand.
You ust love cinnamon. I didn't find it more helpful than the regular bedtime yogy tea but I love all yogi tead and will be repurchasing.
Sweet cinnamon with a mild nutty taste i tried adding milk but i like it best on its own.i dont notice it helping my sleep  but it's delicious.

This tea has a mildly sweet taste, which does help calm the nervous system. I drink before bedtime or at work when I'm feeling stretched. The ingredients are superb. Thank you Yogi for producing one of a kind teas!
this tea smells and tastes like Horchata. strong cinnamon flavor, which I like. I will re order that tea because I like it very much
I really like this brand & this is a good flavor. It is a lighter brew though so you may want to double bag if you like a stronger brew.
good quality tea, good quality ingredients, good taste, i use it daily
OMG GIRLS I love ittt i use it for my stretch marks the size is big too and the quality it's just amazing!!
Has an earthy taste, just add a creamer of choice. You can add some sweetener if you prefer
We love the taste and smell of this tea. It is very nice. Nice packaging as well. Will definitely repurchase.
High quality tea, tastes great. I really like yogi tea, they are great
The taste is so good and it is good for relaxing
Tasty, calming early morning or late night tea. Nice price too and high quality. Helps maintain your energy levels.

This tea really helps me to sleep. It tastes great too!
Let it steep for a while, the taste is weak otherwise.

review_title: Great quality, tasty, and relaxing. Use it ever morning. Good package and many bags.
review_text: Great quality, tasty, and relaxing. Use it ever morning. Good package and many bags.

cinnamon flavour and smell is very very strong..
it can really make you sleep better
Nice, different taste. Not quite like a standard Horchata but still has a pleasant unique taste
I use sleep teas almost every night.  I enjoy the flavor very much but not sure if it helps with stress.
I am a big fan of yogi teas and wanted to try this flavor but didn't like it at all, the flavor was nauseating to me, but maybe others will like it.

I always buy herbal tea before bed. I found out that there was stress tea so I bought it. It has a nice aroma, is easy to drink, and just smelling it makes me feel relaxed. The tea leaves are firm so I think I could drink two cups. It's caffeine-free so I can drink it before going to bed without worry.

And the only tea brand I ride and constantly try new flavors. The flavors are excellent, natural ingredients, beautiful packaging, good price and there is also a positive message about each of the shades in short perfection

The quality, ingredients, taste, quantity and packaging are all very good. Tea without calories and sugar is good to drink. The blended aroma is very good. It is also convenient without caffeine. You can drink it whenever you want every day.
I really like Yogiti because it’s cheap and the quality is good. Cinnamon Horchata has a slightly sweet and savory taste. It is effective in calming the mind.

review_title: Relax with a slightly spicy taste
review_text: It has a slightly spicy taste among Yogi Teas, but it is caffeine-free so it is easy to drink before going to bed. It is recommended when you want to relax!
Amazing quality, my favorite tea, really, really good company, good taste, pleasant, relaxing and warming
As expected, Yogi tea is delicious. I'm also happy that it's caffeine-free!
The tea contains good herbs and it is best that it is caffeine-free. I drink it before bed. The taste is sweet and refreshing. The size of the box is nice.
The scent may be a matter of personal preference. If you like cinnamon, I think it has a relaxing effect. I like to drink it with milk.
It's a strange blend unique to Yogiti and is easy to drink, but I don't think it has a horchata flavor. The taste was good and I didn't mind, but I wouldn't buy it again.
